subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher R. A. Dickey, who does not have an ulnar collateral ligament in his right elbow, has defied skeptics to become one of the most intriguing players in any spring training camp.
snippet: Pitcher R. A. Dickey, who does not have an ulnar collateral ligament in his right elbow, has defied skeptics to become one of the most intriguing players in any spring training camp.
